numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The headline is: The Generation of 2021 COVID TIMES!
2. I think that the world does not get better with each generation.
3. I believe that social media changes people in good ways and in bad ways.
4. I tend to see only the bad ways.
5. Young people tend to wear clothing that shows much skin.
6. Some young people think that they are adults.
7. Some young people feel mature.
8. I think that some young people try to impress other people.
9. I think that some young people try to impress other people with riches and fame.
10. My mother told me something.
11. If you see a person dance then you can tell if the person dances because the person loves to dance or if the person dances to impress other people.
12. If a person dances to impress other people then it feels desperate.
13. Body image is another example.
14. I think that what a person sees online can make the person try it.
15. This can hurt a person physically.
16. This can hurt a person mentally.
17. I notice that Indonesia is the highest.
18. I thought that the US would be the highest.
19. I wonder why these specific countries were chosen.
20. I wonder how the choice of these countries affects people.
21. I wonder how the choice of these countries affects the ego of people.
22. I am a member of the age group from 15 years to 24 years.
23. I find this graph odd.
24. I find this graph confusing.
25. This graph makes me reflect about my past.
26. I think that my past can help me in the future.
27. I think that the graph shows different opinions.
28. I think that people in different countries have these opinions about life.
29. I think that the graph shows similar opinions.
30. I think that people share these similar opinions.
31. I think that this can affect people.
32. I think that this can affect the life of people.
